alert.note: Alert for Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of DeKalb, eastern Cobb, southwestern Gwinnett and central Fulton Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Brookhaven, or near Decatur, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Decatur, Peachtree Corners, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Smyrna, Dunwoody, East Point, Duluth, Snellville, Lilburn, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, and Avondale Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; South Fulton
